title: Worm Scarf
summaries: The Worm Scarf is an accessory that reduces incoming damage by 17%. This damage reduction from this item is calculated after defense is applied:
Damage taken = ( Raw damage - (Defense * (0.5 or 0.75 or 1 for Classic/Expert/Master Mode, respectively)) ) * (1 - .17)
The Worm Scarf is always dropped from the <linked>Eater of Worlds</linked>' <linked>Treasure Bag</linked> in <linked>Expert Mode</linked>.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
